article_title: Medicaid Not Big Enough? Obama Administration Proposes $100 Billion More Spending

article_metadata.description: Even though Medicaid has grown dramatically and recent evidence suggests the program is not working well, President Obama is proposing more than $100 billion in new Medicaid spending over the next decade. This piece discusses Medicaid's recent growth and the three most expensive Medicaid policies proposed by the president.
article_metadata.author: The Apothecary
